game.name: Delivery Man
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A small town food delivery man receives an order to deliver food to a strange house. When he arrived, he discovered that the house contained a terrifying secret that one who knew it would not be able to escape to tell others.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A small town food delivery man receives an order to deliver food to a strange house. When he arrived, he discovered that the house contained a terrifying secret that one who knew it would not be able to escape to tell others.
